headline.print_headline: Jail Time Increases Odds of Hypertension, Researchers Find
headline.main: Jail Time Increases Odds of Hypertension, Researchers Find

docs.lead_paragraph: Development of hypertension in former inmates was not related to the usual risk factors, like smoking and alcohol use, a study has found.
docs.snippet: Development of hypertension in former inmates was not related to the usual risk factors, like smoking and alcohol use, a study has found.

headline.seo: New York City Health Educators Use Drug Marketers’ Techniques
headline.print_headline: Taking a Page, And a Pen, From Makers Of Medicines
headline.main: Taking a Page, and a Pen, From Makers of Medicines

docs.lead_paragraph: New York City is using representatives known as detailers to conduct public health campaigns drawing on the techniques of drug company salespeople.
docs.snippet: New York City is using representatives known as detailers to conduct public health campaigns drawing on the techniques of drug company salespeople.

headline.main: Answers About Local Food in New York, Part 3

docs.abstract: Taking Questions: Jacquie Berger, executive director of Just Food, a nonprofit organization that works to develop a just and sustainable food system in the region, is answering readers' questions this week.
docs.lead_paragraph: Following is the third and final set of answers from Jacquie Berger, the executive director of Just Food, a nonprofit organization that works to develop a just and sustainable food system in the New York City region. She will be answering selected readers' questions about community-supported agriculture and other ways to access farm-fresh produce as well as urban food-growing opportunities in New York's communities.
docs.snippet: Taking Questions: Jacquie Berger, executive director of Just Food, a nonprofit organization that works to develop a just and sustainable food system in the region, is answering readers' questions this week.

headline.seo: Women Are Shocked by Their New Bra Size
headline.print_headline: Your Bra Size: The Truth May (Pleasantly) Surprise You
headline.main: Your Bra Size: The Truth May (Pleasantly) Surprise You

docs.lead_paragraph: Many women — to their shock or glee — are finding that DD is becoming the new C.
docs.snippet: Many women — to their shock or glee — are finding that DD is becoming the new C.

headline.seo: Brown Fat Identified as Heat-Yielding Cells in Humans
headline.print_headline: Human Fat Cell Burns Calories? Studies Say Yes
headline.main: Calorie-Burning Fat? Studies Say You Have It

docs.lead_paragraph: Originally believed to be lost after infancy, calorie-burning brown fat has been discovered in adults.
docs.snippet: Originally believed to be lost after infancy, calorie-burning brown fat has been discovered in adults.
